histogram.summary: ChromeOS network metric recording instances where Shill is told to restart the WiFi device. This is triggered by udev event from the iwl7000 driver. See b/270746800 for more details. This metric will be removed once we notice the driver not sending these requests. This removal process is tracked in b/278765529.

histogram.name: Network.Shill.WiFi.RoamComplete
histogram.summary: ChromeOS network metric recording roam successes or failures. This is recorded every time a client succeeds or fails to roam from one wireless access point to another.

histogram.name: Network.Shill.WiFi.RoamTime
histogram.summary: ChromeOS network metric recording roam time in milliseconds. This is recorded every time a successful roam from one wireless access point to another occurs.

histogram.name: Network.Shill.WiFi.ScanResult
histogram.summary: ChromeOS network usage metric describing, for a WiFi scan attempt, what scan method is used and whether it ends in a connection.

histogram.name: Network.Shill.WiFi.ScanTimeInEbusy
histogram.summary: ChromeOS network usage metric describing, for a WiFi scan attempt, how many milliseconds were spent waiting to talk to the kernel/drivers.

histogram.name: Network.Shill.Wifi.Security
histogram.summary: ChromeOS network usage metric. The security setting for each successful WiFi connection.

histogram.name: Network.Shill.Wifi.SecurityChange
histogram.summary: ChromeOS network metric for WiFi security changes. It is emitted every time a new BSSID is being added to a network, this network has already been connected before and configuration of this new BSSID causes network security to be changed in a non-trivial way - that is a downgrade or an upgrade that can cause split of an network into two services.

histogram.name: Network.Shill.Wifi.ServiceErrors
histogram.summary: ChromeOS connection manager service errors for wifi interface.

histogram.name: Network.Shill.WiFi.SessionLength
histogram.summary: ChromeOS network metric recording session length in milliseconds. This is recorded every time an uninterrupted session with a wireless access point is terminated.

histogram.name: Network.Shill.WiFi.SessionTagState.{Event}
histogram.summary: ChromeOS metric reporting the state of the "session tag" state machine that tags {Event} structured metrics events. The state of the session tag is emitted at the same time as the {Event} structured metric event is emitted. Details at go/cros-wifi-metrics-session-tag-dd.

histogram.name: Network.Shill.Wifi.SignalAtDisconnect
histogram.summary: ChromeOS network metric indicating the negative of the dBm received signal strength recorded at the time of a WiFi disconnect.

histogram.name: Network.Shill.Wifi.SignalStrength
histogram.summary: ChromeOS network metric indicating the negative of the dBm received signal strength recorded at the time a successful WiFi connection started.

histogram.name: Network.Shill.WiFi.SupplicantAttempts
histogram.summary:
Number of attempts required for a WiFi device to be established with WPA supplicant (shill retries on failure). This metric is reported either on success, reporting the number of attempts performed; or after repeated failures (currently 6), we give up and report an artificial maximum (10).
Thus, a value of 10 means we aborted after repeated failures. Values of 1 to 6 represent successful connections on the first to sixth try. Values of 7 to 9 (which should not occur) represent successful connections after seven or more attempts (success reports are capped at 9).

histogram.name: Network.Shill.WiFi.TimeFromRekeyToFailureSeconds
histogram.summary: Time spent between network rekey attempt to connection failure. The metric timer starts when a rekey is initiated and stops once a connection failure is reported or another rekey is initiated. The metric is only reported if the timer is stopped by a connection failure within 180 seconds.

histogram.name: Network.Shill.Wifi.TimeOnline
histogram.summary: ChromeOS network metric sampling the time spent using WiFi to transport data. These data are mostly useful when summed and compared to TimeOnline for other network technologies (e.g. WiFi vs Cellular).

histogram.name: Network.Shill.Wifi.TimeResumeToReady
histogram.summary: ChromeOS network performance metric sampling the time from the resume event to the time when an 802.11 wireless network has configured its Layer 3 state.

histogram.name: Network.Shill.WiFi.TimeResumeToReadyHB
histogram.summary: ChromeOS network performance metric sampling the time from the resume event to the time when an 802.11 wireless network has configured its Layer 3 state if the AP associated to after resume is the same as the one before suspend, and the AP is on the 5GHz band.

histogram.name: Network.Shill.WiFi.TimeResumeToReadyLB
histogram.summary: ChromeOS network performance metric sampling the time from the resume event to the time when an 802.11 wireless network has configured its Layer 3 state if the AP associated to after resume is the same as the one before suspend, and the AP is on the 2.4GHz band.

histogram.name: Network.Shill.WiFi.TimeResumeToReadyUHB
histogram.summary: ChromeOS network performance metric sampling the time from the resume event to the time when an 802.11 wireless network has configured its Layer 3 state if the AP associated to after resume is the same as the one before suspend, and the AP is on the 6GHz band.

histogram.name: Network.Shill.Wifi.TimeToConfig
histogram.summary: ChromeOS network performance metric sampling the time to configure Layer 3 state on an 802.11 wireless network (typically acquire a DHCP lease).

histogram.name: Network.Shill.Wifi.TimeToConnect
histogram.summary: ChromeOS network performance metric sampling the time to connect to a WiFi Basic Service Set (which consists of the access point and associated stations on a particular WiFi channel for a specific network).

histogram.name: Network.Shill.Wifi.TimeToInitialize
histogram.summary: ChromeOS network performance metric sampling the time to initialize an 802.11 wireless device.

histogram.name: Network.Shill.Wifi.TimeToJoin
histogram.summary: ChromeOS network performance metric sampling the time to join (associate plus authenticate) an 802.11 wireless network.

histogram.name: Network.Shill.Wifi.TimeToOnline
histogram.summary: ChromeOS network performance metric sampling the time to determine that an 802.11 wireless network is online after configuring Layer 3 state.

histogram.name: Network.Shill.Wifi.TimeToPortal
histogram.summary: ChromeOS network performance metric sampling the time to determine that an 802.11 wireless network is in a captive portal after configuring Layer 3 state.

histogram.name: Network.Shill.Wifi.TimeToRedirectFound
histogram.summary: ChromeOS network performance metric sampling the time to determine that an 802.11 wireless network is in a captive portal with a valid redirect URL after configuring Layer 3 state.

histogram.name: Network.Shill.Wifi.TimeToScan
histogram.summary: ChromeOS network performance metric sampling the time to scan WiFi until a connection is found.

histogram.name: Network.Shill.Wifi.TimeToScanAndConnect
histogram.summary: ChromeOS network performance metric sampling the time between the beginning of a WiFi scan (if the scan includes both a progressive scan and a full scan, the TimeToScanAndConnect starts with the first scan of the series) and the completion of a successful connection.

histogram.name: Network.Shill.WiFi.TransmitBitrateMbps
histogram.summary: ChromeOS network performance metric that tracks the transmit bitrate in Mbps for the wifi device when it is connected to a network. The bitrate is reported once every minute after the wifi connection is established.

histogram.name: Network.Shill.Wifi.UnreliableLinkSignalStrength
histogram.summary: ChromeOS network metric sampling the signal strength (0-100) of the wifi network when it becomes unreliable (experiencing multiple link failures in a short period of time).

histogram.name: Network.Shill.WiFi.UserInitiatedConnectionFailureReason
histogram.summary: ChromeOS network performance metric that tracks the reasons of failed user-initiated WiFi connection attempts. The result of the user-initiated WiFi connection attempts are being tracked by Network.Shill.WiFi.UserInitiatedConnectionResult.

histogram.name: Network.Shill.WiFi.UserInitiatedConnectionResult
histogram.summary: ChromeOS network performance metric that tracks the result of user-initiated WiFi connection attempts.

histogram.name: Network.Shill.{Technology}.DHCPv4ProvisionDurationMillis
histogram.summary: ChromeOS network usage metric emitted after a {Technology} connection has DHCPv4 provisioned, to track the duration from shill starts DHCPv4 configuration until shill gets the DHCP configuration from the dhcpcd process.

histogram.name: Network.Shill.{Technology}.IPType
histogram.summary: ChromeOS network usage metric emitted after a {Technology} connection has been connected for 30 seconds, to track the IP type on this connection. Wait for 30 seconds because IPv4 and IPv6 configuration are usually provisioned at different time. Note that no metric will be emitted if the duration of the connection is shorter than 30 seconds.

histogram.name: Network.Shill.{Technology}.SLAACProvisionDurationMillis
histogram.summary: ChromeOS network usage metric emitted after a {Technology} connection has SLAAC provisioned, to track the duration from shill requests the kernel to start SLAAC configuration until shill gets the first SLAAC address from the kernel.

histogram.name: Network.VisibilityAwareResourceScheduler.Deprioritized
histogram.summary: Whether a resource request is deprioritized because the resource is coming from a background tab. Recorded when a resource request is scheduled.

histogram.name: Network.Wifi.Channel
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: ChromeOS network usage metric. The channel used for each successful WiFi connection.

histogram.name: Network.Wifi.PhyMode
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: ChromeOS network usage metric. The channel type used for each successful WiFi connection.

histogram.name: Network.Wifi.RoundTripTime
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: Network metric reporting the average round trip time to the WiFi gateway. Recorded at least once per day.

histogram.name: Network.Wifi.Security
histogram.owner: Please list the metric's owners. Add more owner tags as needed.
histogram.summary: ChromeOS network usage metric. The security setting for each successful WiFi connection.

histogram.name: Network.Wifi.Synced.Connection.FailureReason
histogram.summary: ChromeOS metric that tracks the failure reason for all connection attempts, manual or automatic, to Wi-Fi networks which were added from Chrome Sync.

histogram.name: Network.Wifi.Synced.Connection.Result
histogram.summary: ChromeOS metric that tracks the result of all connection attempts, manual or automatic, to Wi-Fi networks which were added from Chrome Sync.

histogram.name: Network.Wifi.Synced.Hidden.Fixed
histogram.summary: ChromeOS network metric tracking the count of synced networks that were fixed after getting saved to the device when out of range and marked as hidden. See b/178089463 for more details.

histogram.name: Network.Wifi.Synced.ManualConnection.FailureReason
histogram.summary: ChromeOS metric that tracks the failure reason for manual connection attempts to Wi-Fi networks which were added from Chrome Sync.

histogram.name: Network.Wifi.Synced.ManualConnection.Result
histogram.summary: ChromeOS metric that tracks the result of manual connection attempts to Wi-Fi networks which were added from Chrome Sync.

histogram.name: Network.Wifi.Synced.TotalCount
histogram.summary: ChromeOS metric that tracks the total number of Wi-Fi networks which are stored in Chrome Sync for the active user.

histogram.name: Network.Wifi.Synced.UpdateOperation.FailureReason
histogram.summary: ChromeOS metric that tracks the failure reason for update attempts to synced Wi-Fi networks. This includes create/modify/remove operations. Each retry is counted seperately.

histogram.name: Network.Wifi.Synced.UpdateOperation.GenerateLocalNetworkConfig.Result
histogram.summary: ChromeOS metric that tracks the success or failure to generate a local network config. Emitted on success and failure of add/update operations.

histogram.name: Network.Wifi.Synced.UpdateOperation.Result
histogram.summary: ChromeOS metric that tracks the result of update attempts to synced Wi-Fi networks. This includes create/modify/remove operations. failures are only recorded after all retries have been exhausted.

histogram.name: Network.Wifi.Synced.ZeroNetworksEligibleForSync.Reason
histogram.summary: ChromeOS metric logged for users who have the feature enabled but have zero networks eligible for sync. Tracks the reasons why none of the networks are eligible.

histogram.name: NetworkService.CorsPreflightMethodAllowed
histogram.summary:
Whether method or normalized method are allowed in CORS preflight request in PreflightResult::EnsureAllowedCrossOriginMethod(), to measure the impact of https://crbug.com/1228178.
Logged for preflight requests that have method checked (i.e. those without errors before EnsureAllowedCrossOriginMethod).

histogram.name: NetworkService.CorsURLLoaderFactoryStart
histogram.summary: Records when CorsURLLoaderFactory::CreateLoaderAndStart is called from mojo to investigate another histogram issue. See https://crbug.com/1439721.

histogram.name: NetworkService.DeletedOldCacheData
histogram.summary: Reports whether or not any old cache data was found and deleted from the http_cache_path when creating a network context within the network service. This is reported each time a network context is created in the network service with a valid http_cache_path and http_cache_enabled is set to true.

histogram.name: NetworkService.GrantSandboxResult
histogram.summary: The result of the attempt to grant the sandbox access to a network context data files, and migrate the data if a migration is requested. This is reported each time a network context instance is created on the network service, even when the sandbox is not enabled or no migration is requested.

histogram.name: NetworkService.InitializedTime
histogram.summary: Records the time from origin to the network service starts when the network service is initialized. See https://crbug.com/1439721.

histogram.name: NetworkService.IpProtection.GetAuthTokenResult
histogram.summary: The result of a call to `IpProtectionConfigCache::GetAuthToken()`. If this fails, it is because the cache was empty when a new connection to a proxy was initiated.

histogram.name: NetworkService.IpProtection.OAuthTokenFetchTime
histogram.summary: Records the elapsed time for successful requests by IpProtectionConfigGetter for an OAuth token.

histogram.name: NetworkService.IpProtection.TokenBatchRequestTime
histogram.summary: Records the elapsed time for successful requests by IpProtectionConfigGetter for blind-signed tokens from BSA.

histogram.name: NetworkService.IpProtection.TokenExpirationRate
histogram.summary: Number of auth tokens that expired before they were used, as a rate per hour, up to 100,000. This value is measured approximately every 5 minutes.

histogram.name: NetworkService.IpProtection.TokenSpendRate
histogram.summary: Number of auth tokens spent, as a rate per hour, up to 1000. This value is measured approximately every 5 minutes.

histogram.name: NetworkService.IpProtection.TryGetAuthTokensResult
histogram.summary: The result of handling a request by the network process to the browser process for a batch of blind-signed auth tokens.

histogram.name: NetworkService.MaskedDomainList.NetworkServiceProxyAllowList.EstimatedMemoryUsageInKB
histogram.summary: Records the estimated memory usage of the NetworkServiceProxyAllowList every time the Masked Domain List is updated.

histogram.name: NetworkService.MaskedDomainList.NetworkServiceResourceBlockList.EstimatedMemoryUsageInKB
histogram.summary: Records the estimated memory usage of the NetworkServiceResourceBlockList every time the Masked Domain List is updated.

histogram.name: NetworkService.MaskedDomainList.SizeInKB
histogram.summary: Record the size of the Masked Domain List proto in KB. Emitted when the raw proto bytes are received from Component Updater and parsed.

histogram.name: NetworkService.MaskedDomainList.UpdateProcessTime
histogram.summary: Records the time it takes to update the NetworkServiceProxyAllowList and NetworkServiceResourceBlockList with the contents of the Masked Domain List after the Network Service receives an update from Component Updater.

histogram.name: NetworkService.MaskedDomainList.UpdateSuccess
histogram.summary: Records the result of an attempt to update the NetworkServiceProxyAllowList and NetworkServiceResourceBlockList with the contents of the Masked Domain List when it is received from Component Updater.

histogram.name: NetworkService.MdnsResponder.ServiceError
histogram.summary: Errors that the mDNS responder service encounters during its lifetime. These may be system errors in mDNS socket creation and IO, or user-induced by invalid IP addresses.

histogram.name: NetworkService.NetworkLoaderCompletionTime.{Source}
histogram.summary:
The time taken to finish a network URLLoader to complete. A network URLLoader is a URLLoader that a CorsURLLoader used internally to load an HTTP response from the underlying layer. The underlying layer serves the response from one of the followings: the network service in-memory cache, a disk cache backend, or the network.
This histogram is recorded for {Source}.

histogram.name: NetworkService.ShutdownTime
histogram.summary: How long the browser waits for the network process to exit at shutdown.

histogram.name: NetworkService.TimeToGrantCacheAccess
histogram.summary: The time taken to permit the sandbox access to the cache directory during network context initialization. This is recorded each time a network context is created with a valid disk cache specified. This histogram is platform dependent so values from different platforms cannot be directly compared. On Windows, this records the amount of time taken to set the filesystem ACLs to allow the sandbox access to the cache directory.

histogram.name: NetworkService.TimeToGrantDataAccess
histogram.summary: The time taken to permit the sandbox access to the data directory during network context initialization. This is recorded each time a network context is created with a valid set of NetworkContextFilePaths with unsandboxed_data_path specified indicating it could be sandboxed. This histogram is platform dependent so values from different platforms cannot be directly compared. On Windows, this records the amount of time taken to set the filesystem ACLs to allow the sandbox access to the data directory.

histogram.name: NetworkService.TimeToGrantSharedDictionaryAccess
histogram.summary: The time taken to permit the sandbox access to the shared dictionary directory during network context initialization. This is recorded each time a network context is created with a valid shared dictionary directory specified. This histogram is platform dependent so values from different platforms cannot be directly compared. On Windows, this records the amount of time taken to set the filesystem ACLs to allow the sandbox access to the cache directory.

histogram.name: NetworkService.TimeToMigrateData
histogram.summary: The time taken to copy the network context data files from the unsandboxed data path to the new sandbox data path. This is recorded each time an unmigrated network context is created with a valid set of data file paths, an unsandboxed_data_path to migrate from, and trigger_migration specified. This could include several logs from the same client for the same network context if the migration fails, since this is reported each time the migration is attempted.

histogram.name: NetworkService.URLLoader.RequestInitiatorOriginLockCompatibility
histogram.obsolete:
Removed in March 2022 / M101.
Old results are preserved in https://docs.google.com/document/d/15j6AKzZ-HgyRQVrKpdGHfGf8D_fcUILmcQ34RAWD1TM/edit?resourcekey=0-wwIJsGSoWmhvFMwMTWdAOw
histogram.summary:
Whether the request origin (i.e. network::ResourceRequest::request_initiator) matches the origin that the browser process expected when creating the URLLoaderFactory (i.e. whether it matches URLLoaderFactoryParams::request_initiator_origin_lock).
Recorded when a request is started (i.e. at the time of constructing network::URLLoader).

histogram.name: NetworkService.URLLoaderFactory.OriginHeaderSameAsRequestOrigin
histogram.summary: Whether the Origin header is the same as the request origin in the URLLoaderFactory when it creates a URLLoader.

histogram.name: NetworkService.URLLoaderFactory.UpdateLoadInfo
histogram.summary: The time it takes for each invocation of URLLoaderFactory.UpdateLoadInfo.
